data.text:
@OntHospitalAssn @ScottPiatkowski So we're just about where we were at the end of February / beginning of March last year - much higher than the end of wave 1. And we are removing measures. With hospital occupancy (total) still running close to or over 100%. 
Protect yourselves, folks. The gov't won't.

@OntHospitalAssn I miss seeing the pandemic of the unvaccinated messages and really miss the vaxx vs unvaxx reporting.
Please give us at least a quick update. Do our numbers look like this? https://t.co/8cjoHWyXsW
